properties.areaDesc: Waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Warning issued March 2 at 2:38AM PST until March 2 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very steep and hazardous seas 11 to 13 feet expected.
North winds 20 to 25 kt, gusts up to 30 kt.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM PST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Very steep and hazardous seas could capsize or cause
damage to vessels.
properties.instruction:
Recreational boaters should remain in port. Commercial vessels
should prepare for rough seas and consider remaining in port
until hazardous seas subside.

NWSheadline: HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...GALE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 3 AM PST EARLY THIS MORNING
